title: Best Kept Secret
description: The secrets haunting Beau Rochester come alive.He doesnâ€™t deserve happiness, but he holds it in his hands. A woman he loves. A child. The past threatens to rip them away. He risks losing them forever.Jane Mendoza is determined to protect the people she loves from every threat--the mysterious arsonist, the corrupt police force. The darkest danger comes from a place she never expects.She risks more than her newfound family. She risks her life.
author: Skye Warren
